title: Hot U.S. job market not leading to fat paychecks
text:
Hot U.S. job market not leading to fat paychecks 3:31pm GMT - 01:30 
U.S. job growth surged in February, recording its biggest increase in more than 1-1/2 years, but a slowdown in wage gains pointed to only a gradual increase in inflation this year, reversing the worry that sparked February's market funk.   
U.S. job growth surged in February, recording its biggest increase in more than 1-1/2 years, but a slowdown in wage gains pointed to only a gradual increase in inflation this year, reversing the worry that sparked February's market funk.  //reut.rs/2p2nzdV
